util.sort package

Submodules

util.sort.quick_sort module

Quick sort module

methods: * quick_sort(values): sorts the given array with comparable items * quick_sort_with_trace(values, trace): sorts the given array with comparable items alongside a trace array

util.sort.quick_sort.quick_sort(values: ndarray) → ndarray[source]

Sort a given list of comparable values (int, float, str etc.) :param values: List to sort :return: Sorted version of the same list

util.sort.quick_sort.quick_sort_with_trace(values: ndarray, trace: ndarray) → tuple[source]

Sort a given list of comparable values (int, float, str etc.), and apply all same swapping operations to the trace array :param values: List to sort :param trace: The tracer list. All swaps applied to the value array will be applied to the trace array :return: Sorted version of the same list and the modified trace list :rtype: tuple

Module contents

General sort utility package. Includes * Quick sort * Quick sort with trace
